text: I've always been an animal lover. I've grown up with dogs my whole life. I think that is what helped me get the role on 'Lassie', I was comfortable around the dog, where many of the kids were afraid or intimidated by Lassie.
author: Will Estes

text: Sometimes in movies, I still have to be the hero, but it's not all that important to me anymore.
author: Dennis Quaid

text: Nobody makes movies bad on purpose.
author: Roland Emmerich

text: 'Home Alone' was a movie, not an alibi.
author: Jerry Orbach

text: It couldn't sound like a dog, because K9 isn't a dog, but I made it sound as mechanical as possible.
author: John Leeson
